submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(key=lambda x:-x)
        verticalCut.sort(key=lambda x:-x)
        horizontalCut.append(0)
        verticalCut.append(0)
        
        res = 0
        h_count,h_index = 1,0
        v_count,v_index = 1,0
        while h_index<m and v_index<n:
            if horizontalCut[h_index]>verticalCut[v_index]:
                res+=horizontalCut[h_index]*v_count
                h_index+=1
                h_count+=1
            else:
                res+=verticalCut[v_index]*h_count
                v_index+=1
                v_count+=1
        return res
